00055 #define dataMoveATtrmm dataMoveATDgemm

00057 #define dataMoveBHtrmm dataMoveBTDgemm

00077 
00078 void dtrmm(char side, char uplo, char transa, char diag,
00079                    int m, int n,
00080                    dataType alpha, dataType *a, int lda,
00081            dataType *b, int ldb)
00082 {
00083   int flagSideisL = 0, flagUploisU = 0, flagTransAisN = 0;
00084   if((side=='l') || (side=='L')) flagSideisL=1;
00085   if((uplo=='u') || (uplo=='U')) flagUploisU=1;
00086   if((transa=='n') || (transa=='N')) flagTransAisN=1;
00087 
00088   if((flagSideisL && flagUploisU && flagTransAisN) ||
00089          (flagSideisL && !flagUploisU && !flagTransAisN) ||
00090          (!flagSideisL && !flagUploisU && flagTransAisN) ||
00091      (!flagSideisL && flagUploisU && !flagTransAisN))
00092   {
00093     dtrmmUpper(side, uplo, transa, diag, m, n, alpha,
00094                         a, lda, b, ldb);
00095   }
00096   else
00097   {
00098     dtrmmLower(side, uplo, transa, diag, m, n, alpha,
00099                         a, lda, b, ldb);
00100   }
00101 }
